name: Sweet Mania (Yum's Story)
description:
Yums are little greedy creatures that are always hungry and looking for food. This is a short and cute story about one of them!

Catch the food and try to quickly identify which one is most valuable and delicious!

Some features:

  • 3 levels = 3 endings
  • 9+ types of food (9 common + 9 with chocolate/ketchup)
  • Original soundtracks (3)
  • Original artworks (19+)
  • Crazy shaking on gaining weight
  • Alice boops Yum

This project made for 5 days by two people. That was... unique experience uwu

How to play:

Artworks & Music belongs to AlisenokMouse
Coding and that "beep" sound on typing by Last2424

Enjoy!
